plugins.author: Luká Lalinský
plugins.description: Moves (disc X) from releases titles into separate tags (discnumber and discsubtitle).
plugins.title: Disc Numbers

plugins.author: Luká Lalinský
plugins.description: Reverts to pre-NGS (aka "Classic") behaviour by adding (disc X: discTitle) to release titles into separate tags (discnumber and discsubtitle).
plugins.notes: Broken in 0.15.1 (OK in later releases); workaround version of plugin available on forum here.
plugins.title: Classic Disc Numbers

plugins.author: Luká Lalinský
plugins.description: Removes (feat. Artist) parts from track titles.
plugins.title: Remove Feat. Artists from Titles

plugins.author: Luká Lalinský, Michael Wiencek
plugins.description: Move "feat." from artist names to album and track titles. e.g. "A feat. B - Song" becomes "A - Song (feat. B)."
plugins.title: Move Feat. Artists to Titles

plugins.author: Javier Kohen, Luká Lalinský
plugins.description: Converts track and release titles to Title Case (capitalizes first character of every word)
plugins.title: Title Case

plugins.author: Oliver Charles, Philipp Wolfer
plugins.description: Downloads cover art for optional tag embedding and/or saving as a separate image file (using standard Options >> Cover Art Picard settings)
plugins.title: Cover Art Downloader

plugins.author: Luká Lalinský
plugins.description: Use Last.fm tags as "genre"
plugins.notes: (copy both files to directory plugins/lastfm/)
plugins.title: Last.fm Tags

plugins.author: RifRaf, voiceinsideyou
plugins.description: Use Last.fm tags as "grouping/genre/moods/occasions/countries/originalyear" and more. Modified version of above plugin.
plugins.notes: Unzip into plugins folder. (so you have plugins/lastfmplus/__init__.py etc) Documentation, forum thread
plugins.title: Last.fm Plus

plugins.author: Luká Lalinský, Philip Jägenstedt
plugins.description: Adds right click option to an unmatched cluster to allow adding releases to MB based on tags.
plugins.title: Add Cluster As A Release

plugins.author: Luká Lalinský
plugins.description: Generates a cuesheet from a release
plugins.title: Generate Cuesheet

plugins.author: Elliot Chance
plugins.description: Appends information to EPs and Singles such as " EP" or " (single)" (customisable, see file for details). Useful for separating releases with singles/EPs of the same name.
plugins.title: Release Type

plugins.author: hrglgrmpf
plugins.description: Do not store specific release information in releases of unknown origin.
plugins.notes: See forum post for details.
plugins.title: No Release

plugins.author: Brian Schweitzer
plugins.description: Launch searches for clusters or releases to external non-MB websites from Picard
plugins.notes: Plugins available for:* All Music Guide* Amazon (supports: .ca, .com, .de, .fr, .jp, and .co.uk)* CastAlbums.org (musicals)* DiscogsFilmMusziek.be (film music)* eBay* Game Music Revolution (game soundtracks)* Google* The Lortel Archives (off-Broadway musicals)* SoundtrackCollector.org (soundtracks)* SoundtrackINFO (soundtracks)
plugins.title: Search Plugins

plugins.author: Philip Jägenstedt
plugins.description: Converts the tags of individual files or clusters between different character encodings. This is often necessary with files that have only ID3v1 tags in a non-Latin encoding.
plugins.notes: You will probably only need to change the target encoding. If the encoding you're looking for isn't in the list, you can type it in yourself and it will hopefully work.
plugins.title: Change Encoding

plugins.author: Philipp Wolfer
plugins.description: Set the original release date of a release by using the release events and "earliest release" advanced relationships.
plugins.notes: Not needed for newer versions of Picard which support the %originaldate% tag directly.
plugins.title: Original Release Date

plugins.author: Creap
plugins.description: Guess sortnames for track and album titles and adds as titlesort and albumsort tags.
plugins.notes: Checks language (English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Swedish) and moves articles ("The", "Das", etc) to the end of the track/album title in the sort tags.
plugins.title: Title sort names

plugins.author: Creap
plugins.description: Moves song metadata such as "demo", "live" from titlesort to version tag.
plugins.notes: Searches titles for keywords like live, demo, mix, etc, and moves it from titles to version tags.
plugins.title: Title version

plugins.author: Philipp Wolfer
plugins.description: Adds the $swapprefix(text, *prefixes) script function, which moves the specified prefixes to the end of the text.
plugins.notes: See this forum post for details.
plugins.title: $swapprefix function

plugins.author: WPME Hofland
plugins.description: Adds the ability to lookup the PUID on MusicBrainz (useful in case there are several tracks linked with the same PUID)
plugins.title: Lookup PUID

plugins.author: Andrew Barnert
plugins.description: Set TSO2 as well as TXXX:ALBUMARTISTSORTORDER in ID3 tags, so album artist sort order works in iTunes and other players
plugins.notes: See this forum post for details.
plugins.title: TSO2

plugins.author: Andrew Barnert
plugins.description: Mac OS X only! Add an album/track/etc. to iTunes.
plugins.notes: See this forum post for details.
plugins.title: Add to iTunes

plugins.author: Aaron Lambers
plugins.description: Allows sorting of clusters and releases (i.e. both panes) through the right click "Plugins" menu. (can sort either Clusters or Releases by Artist or Title, and within a cluster by artist or title)
plugins.notes: See this forum post for details.
plugins.title: The Sorting Plugin

plugins.author: WPME Hofland
plugins.description: Combination of the discnumber and bonus disc plugin
plugins.title: Discnumber and Bonus disc

plugins.author: anonymous
plugins.description: Replace hard-to-type-into-search-boxes fancy punctuation with Latin-1 equivalents
plugins.notes: See forum and bug ticket for details.
plugins.title: Convert Typographic Punctuation

plugins.author: hrglgrmpf
plugins.description: Analyse your albums using the foobar2000 ReplayGain scanner.
plugins.notes: See forum post for details.
plugins.title: Foobar2000 ReplayGain

plugins.author: Olivier Kaloudoff
plugins.description: Analyse your albums using the MetaFlac ReplayGain scanner.
plugins.notes: Tested only on Mac OSX / Feedback to kalou at kalou dot net
plugins.title: MetaFlac ReplayGain

plugins.author: Brian Schweitzer
plugins.description: Each plugin adds a new function to taggerscript, to allow comparison of a variable against more than one string. Example: set %engineer% to "test" if the artist is equal to "foo", "bar", or "baz":  $if($eq2(%artist%,foo,bar,baz),$set(engineer,test))
plugins.notes: See forum post for details.
plugins.title: $eq2, $ne2 functions

plugins.author: Brian Schweitzer
plugins.description: Adds an $p(string, unofficial) function to taggerscript. This works like the inverse of a \p{foo} regex using Unicode properties. In other words, it tells you what script a character belongs to. Usage: $p(%something%) $p(%something%, True) The second argument is optional. By default, it is set to False. When set to True, unofficial Unicode scripts (i.e. ConScript, etc.) are also checked.
plugins.notes: See forum post for details.
plugins.title: $p function

plugins.author: Michael Elsdörfer
plugins.description: Open files/folders in the GUI environment.
plugins.title: Open in GUI

plugins.author: ichneumon
plugins.description: Remove "Perfect" matches from album list i.e. all tracks matched and tags saved.
plugins.notes: See forum post for details.
plugins.title: Remove Perfect albums

plugins.author: encukou
plugins.description: Save albums with 4+ tracks and 90%+ confidence on all tracks, then remove them from the album list. Useful when importing a big, relatively well-tagged collection.
plugins.notes: See forum post for details.
plugins.title: Autosave complete albums

plugins.author: Tony Flaks
plugins.description: Stores and retrieves metadata in "sidecar" files so that changes can be staged.
plugins.notes: See wiki page for details.
plugins.title: Sidecars
